description: This file defines a utility function for computing SHA256 hashes of text with optional salting, primarily used for generating content hashes.

methods.name: str content_hash(text: str, salt: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Computes and returns the SHA256 hash of the given text with an optional salt.

ctags.name: content_hash
ctags.pattern: /^def content_hash(text: str, salt: Optional[str] = None) -> str:$/
